definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Or writing a fantastic story, painting or sculpting.
sentences.chinese: 或寫一個不錯的故事，繪畫或雕像。

sentences.english: Here are the three steps of drawing a sketch map of Siu Sai Wan.
sentences.chinese: 以下是繪畫小西灣略圖的三個步驟。

sentences.english: In this way, the isosceles triangle of a "waist" painting it.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣，等腰三角形的“腰”繪畫。

sentences.english: Artists who try to keep his uniform degree of light and shade in painting.
sentences.chinese: 那位美術家盡力保持他繪畫中明暗度的均勻。

sentences.english: Painting originated in prehistoric times with murals drawn on cave walls.
sentences.chinese: 繪畫始於史前時期洞穴牆壁上的蹙畫。

sentences.english: They speak to the deeper history of painting.
sentences.chinese: 它們在向繪畫的歷史深處訴說。

sentences.english: Hero's classes will be held at the Ruskin School of Drawing and Fine Art.
sentences.chinese: 赫羅的上課地點將在拉斯金繪畫和美術學院。

sentences.english: Huayan is a very famous artist with good reputation in the Chinese painting history.
sentences.chinese: 華嵒是中國繪畫史上享有較高聲譽的一位畫家。

sentences.english: Illustrated poetry is the artistic integration of Chinese poetry and painting .
sentences.chinese: 題畫詩，是中國詩歌與中國繪畫相互融合的藝術結晶。

sentences.english: I stayed with OSV as long as I was painting trains basically.
sentences.chinese: 我住的OSV只要我基本上是繪畫列車。

sentences.english: But I am more interested in painting now.
sentences.chinese: 但是我現在對繪畫更感興趣了。

sentences.english: It is a funky restaurant with very interesting art on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 那是一家牆上掛着很成心思的繪畫的新潮餐館。

sentences.english: Chinese artists believe that calligraphy and painting share one common source.
sentences.chinese: 國畫家們相信書法和繪畫是相通的。

sentences.english: Early paintings depict figures using outdoor furniture often resembling more natural rock formations.
sentences.chinese: 早期繪畫中描繪的戶外傢俱多呈自然石形。

sentences.english: It looks like it came straight out of some 19th century orientalist painting.
sentences.chinese: 看起來簡直就像19世紀東方繪畫。

sentences.english: Painting, woodworking, sculpting, programming or blogging are all great starts.
sentences.chinese: 繪畫，做木工，雕刻，編程和寫博客都是很好的開始。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
